actions.text: On agreeing to the Weller amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment limits FHA Mortgage Insurance Premiums for first-time homebuyers who complete an approved program with respect to the responsibilities of home ownership.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 70 in the Congressional Record of June 25, 1996, to limit FHA mortgage insurance premium payments to 2.0% of the amount of the original insured principal obligation for first-time hombuyers who complete a financial management counseling program.
